comments:
In the LCD if you have a readonly ant ocnfig selected and you use the context menu to create a new config, or to duplicate the selected one you will get the following error:

It appears that in AntJRETab#initializeFrom you are trying to write back to a read-only file.

Created an attachment (id=52139)
proposed fix

Patch checks if the config is dirty and can be written to before trying to save.

Place for improvement might be to examine not writing back to a config used solely for the purpose of initializing and new one.
